Title: Requires the budget submitted by the governor to include an itemization, by each individual school district, of appropriations for the support of school districts
Summary: Requires the budget submitted by the governor to include an itemization, by each individual school district, of appropriations for the support of school districts.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring itemization, by school district, of proposed appropriations to the education department for the support of school districts
